Token.Abstract: User in the Kinvey System
Username of this Kinvey User. Publicly queryable be default.

Optional surname for the user. Publicly queryable be default.
Optional surname for the user. Publicly queryable be default.

Checks if the user has verified email (by clicking the link in the email sent via sendEmailConfirmationForUser:withCompletionBlock:.
Checks if the user has verified email (by clicking the link in the email sent via sendEmailConfirmationForUser:withCompletionBlock:.

The currently active user of the application.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the user object for the current user. nil if the user has not been set yet or has been cleared.

Token.Abstract: Initialize the "Current User" for Kinvey
Create a new Kinvey user and register them with the backend.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username to create, if it already exists on the back-end an error will be returned.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The user's password

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate to inform once creation completes @deprecatedIn 1.19.0

Token.Abstract: Create a new Kinvey user and register them with the backend. * @param username The username to create, if it already exists on the back-end an error will be returned. * @param password The user's password * @param completionBlock The callback to perform when the creation completes (or errors).

Parameter.Name: fieldsAndValues
Parameter.Abstract: additional data to populate the user object, such as KCSUserAttributeSurname, KCSUserAttributeGivenname and KCSUserAttributeEmail. Can be nil.

Token.Abstract: Creates a unique user with a default username and password.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The callback to perform when the creation completes (or errors).

Token.Abstract: Creates a unique user with a default username and password.

Parameter.Name: fieldsAndValues
Parameter.Abstract: additional data to populate the user object, such as KCSUserAttributeSurname, KCSUserAttributeGivenname and KCSUserAttributeEmail. Can be nil.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The callback to perform when the creation completes (or errors).

Token.Abstract: Loads the user data from the keychain and sets as the activeUser.
Login an existing user, generates an error if the user doesn't exist

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username of the user

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The user's password

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate to inform once the action is complete @deprecatedIn 1.19.0

Token.Abstract: Login an existing user, generates an error if the user doesn't exist

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username of the user

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The user's password

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that is called when the action is complete

Token.Abstract: Login a user with social network access information.

Parameter.Name: provider
Parameter.Abstract: the enumerated social network identity provider

Parameter.Name: accessDictionary
Parameter.Abstract: the credentials needed to authenticate the user for log-in

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called when the operation completes or fails

Token.Abstract: Removes a user and their data from Kinvey

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that is called when operation is complete or fails.

Token.Abstract: Logout the user.
Update the user object from the server.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: called when the refresh is complete or fails. The objectsOrNil property will have only the user, if there is no error.

Token.Abstract: Called to update the Kinvey state of a user.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: block called upon completion or error

Token.Abstract: Return the value for an attribute for this user

Parameter.Name: attribute
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to retrieve

Token.Abstract: Set the value for an attribute

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value to set.

Parameter.Name: attribute
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to modify.

Token.Abstract: Remove a stored attribute. No error if the attribute has not been set.

Parameter.Name: attribute
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to modify.

Token.Abstract: Update a user's password and save the user object to the backend.

Parameter.Name: newPassword
Parameter.Abstract: the new password for the user

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: block to be notified when operation is completed or fails. The objectsOrNil return array will have the updated user as its only value if successful. @sicne 1.13.0

Token.Abstract: Sends a password reset email to the specified user.

Parameter.Name: usernameOrEmail
Parameter.Abstract: the username or user email to send the password reset link to

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the request callback. emailSent is true if the email address is found and an email is sent (does not guarantee delivery). If emailSent is NO, then the errorOrNil value will have information as to what went wrong on the network. For security reasons, emailSent will be true even if the user is not found or the user does not have an associated email.

Token.Abstract: Sends a username reminder email to the specified user.

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: the email address to send a reminder to

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: returns true if the system received the request, regardless if the email is valid, associated with a user, or actually sent. The error object will be non-nil if a network error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends an request to confirm email address to the specified user.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: the user to send the password reset link to

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the request callback. emailSent is true if the email address is found and an email is sent (does not guarantee delivery). If emailSent is NO, then the errorOrNil value will have information as to what went wrong on the network. For security reasons, emailSent will be true even if the user is not found or the user does not have an associated email.

Token.Abstract: Checkes the server to see if a username is already being used.

Parameter.Name: potentialUsername
Parameter.Abstract: the username to check

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: if there is no error, usernameAlreadyTaken will be YES if that username is in use, and NO if it is available

Token.Abstract: Checks that the a twitter account has been set up by the user on the device and that the KCSClient has been configured to obtain an auth token.

ReturnValue.Abstract: true if there is enough information to request an access token from twitter

Token.Abstract: Calls the Twitter reverse auth service to obtain an access token for the native user.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called when the request completes or faults.

Token.Abstract: Calls LinkedIn to obtain a user's auth token. You have to specify KCSLINKEDINAPIKEY, KCSLINKEDINSECRETKEY, KCSLINKEDINACCEPTREDIRECT, and KCSLINKEDINCANCELREDIRECT in the KCSClient set-up. A web view is needed in order to display LinkedIn's sign-in page. A user must enter LinkedIn credentials and press "Allow access". If the user cancels or the system is unable to verify the app credentials, the process will fail.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called when the request completes or faults. This is the place to dismiss the webview if necessary.

Parameter.Name: webview
Parameter.Abstract: for showing the LinkedIn access form.

Token.Abstract: Calls LinkedIn to obtain a user's auth token. You have to specify KCSLINKEDINAPIKEY, KCSLINKEDINSECRETKEY, KCSLINKEDINACCEPTREDIRECT, and KCSLINKEDINCANCELREDIRECT in the KCSClient set-up. A web view is needed in order to display LinkedIn's sign-in page. A user must enter LinkedIn credentials and press "Allow access". If the user cancels or the system is unable to verify the app credentials, the process will fail.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called when the request completes or faults. This is the place to dismiss the webview if necessary.

Parameter.Name: permissions
Parameter.Abstract: the level of access to the user's account. For example, @"r_network" will retreive the user's profile as well as his connections. Since the LinkedIn documentation for the full list of values.

Parameter.Name: webview
Parameter.Abstract: for showing the LinkedIn access form.
